title: Update Project Scope and Requirements - Ready for Approval
description:
This task has been reviewed and the following changes have been made:
- Clarified desired features by specifying a non-functional requirement for the library to support multiple machine learning algorithms.
- Added a functional requirement for the library to allow users to easily define and train models using a declarative approach.
- Updated target audience description to include data scientists, researchers, and developers who are interested in machine learning but may not have extensive programming experience.
- Clarified performance expectations by specifying that the library should be able to efficiently process large datasets with clear guidelines for expected processing time for specific dataset sizes and scenarios.
- Added scalability requirements by stating that the library should be able to handle increasing amounts of data as needed, with a suggested approach for scaling up or out when necessary.
- Updated integration requirements to specify that the library should integrate smoothly with popular machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn, as well as common programming languages like Python and R. Additionally, it should provide interoperability with popular data handling libraries such as Pandas and NumPy.
- Added a requirement for providing extensive documentation to help users understand how to use the library effectively, including tutorials, examples, and API references.
- Clarified error handling requirements by stating that the library should provide clear and actionable error messages when issues occur during model training or evaluation.
- Updated the 'assigned_to' field to 'project-manager', who will oversee the task decomposition and reassignment as needed.
- In addition, I suggest adding a requirement for automated testing and validation of the library to ensure its reliability and robustness, and to make it easier to identify and fix any issues that may arise.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the library, including the core components, data structures, and APIs.

title: Implement Core Library Components
description: Develop the core components of the library, including the declarative model definition, training, and evaluation modules.

title: Develop Supporting Utilities and Tools
description: Implement supporting utilities and tools for data preprocessing, model serialization, and deployment.

title: Create Documentation and Examples
description: Write comprehensive documentation and provide examples for using the library effectively.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the library.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the library's functionality and reliability.

title: Perform Security Audits
description: Conduct security audits to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the library.
